bibl.title: Ptolemaic and Roman Burials from Theban Tomb - 400 -.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The middle Ptolemaic burials. - 3. Burials of the early Imperial period. - 4. The demotic inscriptions [a linen strip with a Greek inscription was also found]. - 5. Summary. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Mitteilungen des Deutschen Archäologischen Instituts. Abteilung Kairo

bibl.seg: Gábor Schreiber, Zsolt Vasáros & Adrienn Almásy, Ptolemaic and Roman Burials from Theban Tomb - 400 -.
MDIK 69 (2013) pp. 187-225, 3 tabl., 22 figg. n./bl. et coul.

1. Introduction. - 2. The middle Ptolemaic burials. - 3. Burials of the early Imperial period. - 4. The demotic inscriptions [a linen strip with a Greek inscription was also found]. - 5. Summary. - Avec résumé en anglais.
